name: typora-themeable
description: Typora-themeable is a clean, customizable, typography-focused theme for the markdown editor, Typora.
author: John Hildenbiddle <http://hildenbiddle.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:fonts
scripts.build:zip: cd dist && rimraf *.zip && zip typora-themeable -r ./* && zip typora-themeable -j ../themeable.md
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run prepare && npm run serve & npm run watch
scripts.version: npm run lint && npm run prepare && git add -A
